accessoryit's about showing your personal style to the world. ot-sdk-columns"><div class="ot-desc-cntr" id="ot-tab-desc" tabindex="0" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="ot-pvcy-hdr"><h4 id="ot-pvcy-hdr">Your Privacy</h4><p id="ot-pc-desc" class="ot-grp-desc">When you visit our website, we may store or retrieve information on your browser using cookies, pixels or similar technologies to make the site work as you expect it to, help us improve the site, give you a more personalized experience, and serve you tailored ads on and off our site. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device. The information can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, choosing not to allow some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. For more information on our privacy practices, including the information we collect automatically when you visit our Website, how we share your personal information as well as your right to access and correct your personal information and withdraw your consent, please see our <a href="/support/privacy-policy" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank" aria-describedby="audioeye_new_window_message">Privacy Policy</a>. Your information may be transferred to us and our advertising partners outside of your province.
            <br role="presentation"><a href="https://cookiepedia.co.uk/giving-consent-to-cookies" class="privacy-notice-link" rel="noopener" target="_blank" aria-label="More information about your privacy, opens in a new tab">Cookie Consent Information</a></p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-1" aria-label="Strictly Necessary Cookies"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Strictly Necessary Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"><div class="ot-always-active">Always Active</div></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, completing transactions, logging in or filling in forms. 

You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work.</p><div class="ot-hlst-cntr"><button class="ot-link-btn category-host-list-handler" aria-label="Cookie Details button opens Cookie List menu" data-parent-id="1">Cookies Details&lrm;</button></div></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-2" aria-label="Performance Cookies"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Performance Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"><div class="ot-always-active">Always Active</div></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. These cookies dont collect information that directly identifies a visitor although they may collect the IP address of the device used to access the site. These cookies allow us to improve a website and a user experience.</p><div class="ot-hlst-cntr"><button class="ot-link-btn category-host-list-handler" aria-label="Cookie Details button opens Cookie List menu" data-parent-id="2">Cookies Details&lrm;</button></div></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-4" aria-label="Targeting Cookies"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Targeting Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-4" id="ot-group-id-4" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="4" checked="" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-4"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-4"><span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Targeting Cookies</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies make marketing messages more relevant to you. We or a third party advertising partner may collect information relating to your browsing history and interests to tailor relevant advertising to you. These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant advertisements on other sites, limit the number of times you see the same advertisement on our websites or mobile applications and to help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. They are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.</p><div class="ot-hlst-cntr"><button class="ot-link-btn category-host-list-handler" aria-label="Cookie Details button opens Cookie List menu" data-parent-id="4">Cookies Details&lrm;</button></div></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-3" aria-label="Functional Cookies"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Functional Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"><div class="ot-always-active">Always Active</div></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality, such as allowing us to recognize you when you return to our website and allowing the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name). (function(){var a=getCookie("pageviewCount");"undefined"===typeof a?a=1:a++;setCookie("pageviewCount",a,30);a=(new Date).getDate();setCookie("day",a,30)})();</script>
